_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five kinds of people who dwell in a: A person may dwell in a charnel ground because of stupidity
A person may dwell in a charnel ground because of bad desires
A person may dwell in a charnel ground because of madness
A person may dwell in a charnel ground because it is praised by the Buddhas
A person may dwell in a charnel ground for the sake of having few wishes
